name: Yozo Office
description: Yozo Office is a powerful office software. Text processing, spreadsheet and making presentation are integrated in the software. Yozo Office is accurately bidirectional-compatible with Microsoft Office files. Its accurate composition, powerful pivot table and rich-plugin mechanism meet the needs of professional users.

en_US.description: Yozo Office is a powerful office software. Text processing, spreadsheet and making presentation are integrated in the software. Yozo Office is accurately bidirectional-compatible with Microsoft Office files. Its accurate composition, powerful pivot table and rich-plugin mechanism meet the needs of professional users.
en_US.name: Yozo Office

zh_CN.description: 永中Office是一款功能强大的办公软件，已经集成了文字处理、电子表格和简报制作三大应用。永中Office对微软Office文档实现双向精确兼容，其精确专业的排版、强大的数据透视表和丰富的插件机制，完全可以满足专业级用户的需求。
zh_CN.name: 永中Office
